courses.title: Raag Basics for Beginners
courses.description: Learn the core concepts of Raags and how they build the foundation of Indian classical music.

courses.title: Sufi Singing Techniques
courses.description: Discover the soulful art of Sufi music with breathing techniques, vocal training, and lyrical depth.

courses.title: Understanding Taal (Rhythm)
courses.description: Master the rhythmic cycles (taals) like Teentaal, Dadra, and Keherwa with practical exercises.

courses.title: Vocal Warmups & Breathing
courses.description: Essential warmups and breath control practices for stronger vocal delivery.

courses.title: Qawwali Foundations
courses.description: Learn the structure and performance style of traditional Qawwali music.

courses.title: Sur & Scale Identification
courses.description: Learn to identify and reproduce sur (notes) accurately with exercises in pitch and ear training.

courses.title: Art of Sama (Spiritual Listening)
courses.description: Explore the spiritual concept of Sama in Sufi tradition and how to experience music as devotion.

courses.title: Harmonium for Beginners
courses.description: Hands-on training for harmonium playing including scales, chords, and raag practice.

courses.title: Voice Modulation & Expression
courses.description: Control your voice with emotion, volume, and tone in spiritual and classical singing.

courses.title: Live Recitation Techniques (Naat/Nasheed)
courses.description: Train for stage-ready performance of Naats and Nasheed with proper tone and adab.
